text.studies: Study, not to know more, but to know better
text.projects: Trust is a key.Without it, no project is successful

edilogic.title:
Windev developer at Edilogic
Aix-en-Provence, France
edilogic.content:
For my first internship, I worked for Edilogic, a small business company that sell accountant software.
I used Windev16 and I developed plugins and features for their main product.

inria.title:
Intern developer at INRIA
Sophia-Antipolis, France
inria.content:
My second internship took places in WIMMICS team from INRIA. I analyzed and developed the interface of Reador.net website, a RSS aggregator.
Using Agile methods, I developed differents interfaces and interactions. I met clients and users and I participated to a forum in Paris to present Reador.net.

designal.title:
Young software engineer at Designal Systems
Mouans-Sartoux, France
